scripts.copy: npm run copy:presidium & npm run copy:content & npm run copy:media & npm run copy:config
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run copy:clean && bundle exec jekyll build -s $npm_package_config_dist -d $npm_package_config_dist/_site
scripts.watch: npm run watch:presidium & npm run watch:content & npm run watch:media & npm run watch:config
scripts.start: npm run watch & sleep $npm_package_config_cooldown && echo LOADED WATCHES...  && bundle exec jekyll serve --incremental -s $npm_package_config_dist -d $npm_package_config_dist/_site
scripts.gh-pages: npm run clean && npm run build && git-directory-deploy --directory $npm_package_config_dist
